thread.title: BRIEF-iHeartCommunications Announces Termination Of Private Offers To Holders Of Its Five Series Of Priority Guarantee Notes And Its Senior Notes Due 2021

title: BRIEF-iHeartCommunications Announces Termination Of Private Offers To Holders Of Its Five Series Of Priority Guarantee Notes And Its Senior Notes Due 2021
text: Market News  40 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-iHeartCommunications Announces Termination Of Private Offers To Holders Of Its Five Series Of Priority Guarantee Notes And Its Senior Notes Due 2021 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 15 (Reuters) - Iheartmedia Inc: * IHEARTCOMMUNICATIONS, INC. ANNOUNCES TERMINATION OF PRIVATE OFFERS TO HOLDERS OF ITS FIVE SERIES OF PRIORITY GUARANTEE NOTES AND ITS SENIOR NOTES DUE 2021 AND TERMINATION OF PRIVATE TERM LOAN OFFERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
